summary: Alison Courtland wakes up in the middle of the night on board a train, but she cannot remember how she got there. Danger and suspense ensue.
cast: Claudette Colbert|Robert Cummings|Don Ameche|Rita Johnson|George Coulouris|Queenie Smith|Ralph Morgan|Keye Luke|Fred Nurney|Raymond Burr|Marya Marco|Lillian Bronson|Hazel Brooks|Murray Alper|Edgar Dearing|Jimmie Dodd|Robert Dudley|Eddie Dunn|James Flavin|Bess Flowers|Lee Tung Foo|Ralph Montgomery|Ralph Peters|Lillian Randolph|Syd Saylor|Charles Sherlock|Anne Triola|Beal Wong
title: Pacto tenebroso
